Source code for src.gateSizing.node



[docs]class Node:
    """
    Class representing a node.

    Class includes:
        class 'RandomVariable' or cvxpy variable,
        array of next gates,
        array of previous gates
    """

    def __init__(self, randomVar):
        self.randVar = randomVar
        self.nextNodes = []
        self.prevDelays = []


[docs]    def setNextNodes(self, nextNodes):
        self.nextNodes = nextNodes



[docs]    def appendNextNode(self, nextNodes):
        self.nextNodes.extend(nextNodes)



[docs]    def setPrevDelays(self, prevDelays):
        self.prevDelays = prevDelays



[docs]    def appendPrevDelays(self, prevDelays):
        self.prevDelays.append(prevDelays)
